author: Flo
content: Gee whiz! Actually I find this rather scary! That drain pipe plastered with freaky emblems of freaky organizations, plus the electrical wire - electricity and water - and ZZZZAPPPP!!! And then the handcuffs - even tho the dangling one is open, I can image that if I got too close - whap, and I'm a prisoner! But this is a fascinating study of a microcosm.
